fields.name: Day 8:
fields.value:
Due to significant fire risk, I was unable to open the digital journal to write an entry. A creature kept placing oil and other flammable materials all over the camp and my supplies. I was forced to spend all day today cleaning. Luckily, I was able to capture footage of the creature, which I'm sending to the lab.
Attack: None
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cover a player in oil, permanently disguising them as a role of your choice
- Cover a player in flammable oil, making all non-Underworld who visit the oiled player the night the Apocalypse ignites die. (1 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you cover yourself in oil and pick a role to disguise as.
- You may change what you are disguised as at any time.
- If you die while visiting a non-Underworld member, you automatically cover your target in flammable oil.

fields.name: Day 8 (cont.):
fields.value: - __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If this is a part of the daily streak faction, targets covered in flammable oil will cause the factional kill to rampage if attacked by the factional kill.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Underworld sect.
